class_notes: Science Writing for Scientific Audiences - In this course, students will practice clear, analytical writing about science for professional and academic settings. Students will review and write scientific papers, visualize data, present research talks, and facilitate scientific conversations. This class is designed for students who have completed at least introductory level courses in some of the natural sciences.
course_description: Course topics will vary but always will be focused on writing, rhetorical composition and analysis, or literacy skills. Topics possible include a variety of options such as journalistic writing, non-fiction, debate, argumentation, persuasion, digital writing, among others.
